programme.title: Enchantimals: Finding Home
programme.desc: Meet the Enchantimals, a group of lovable girls who share a bond with their animal besties. In “Finding Home,” things get a bit wild when the girls discover a lost peacock Enchantimal and her bestie and decide to share their homes with the newcomers.

programme.title: Enchantimals Tales from Everwilde
programme.desc: Meet the Enchantimals™, a group of lovable girls who share a special bond with their animal besties. These amazing half-girl, half-animal friends live in a fantastical world where fun and adventure are around every corner, and sharing is our everything!

programme.title: American Girl Dolled Up!
programme.desc: Join Barbie and her friends as they embark on exciting adventures, tackle fun challenges, and share heartwarming moments. Whether they’re exploring new worlds, hosting fabulous parties, or learning valuable life lessons, each episode is packed with inspiration and entertainment. Dive into a world of imagination and creativity with Barbie and her beloved doll companions. Don’t miss out on the magic and fun!

programme.title: Monster High: Boo York, Boo York
programme.desc: It's fright lights, big city when the Monster High ghouls head to Boo York! Cleo de Nile is invited to attend a fancy gala celebrating the return of a magical comet and, of course, she brings along her beast friends. But their trip isn't all fun and frightseeing because Nefera, Cleo's sister, uses the comet's powers for her own spooktacularly sneaky plans.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Fun-packed adventures with your favorite ghouls from Monster High.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Fun-packed adventures with your favorite ghouls from Monster High.

programme.title: Ask Barbie!
programme.desc: Discover our favorite episodes of Barbie: Live with Dolls! Join Barbie and her friends as they embark on exciting adventures, tackle fun challenges, and share heartwarming moments. Whether they’re exploring new worlds, hosting fabulous parties, or learning valuable life lessons, each episode is packed with inspiration and entertainment. Dive into a world of imagination and creativity with Barbie and her beloved doll companions. Don't miss out on the magic and fun!

programme.title: The Barbie & Barbie Show
programme.desc: It’s Malibu’s laid-back elegance fused with Brooklyn’s vibrant, eclectic energy. Welcome to Barbie & Barbie, where coastal sophistication meets urban edge in a dazzling blend of style and charm.

programme.title: Barbie Doll Adventures
programme.desc: Welcome to Doll World! A beautiful place where all dolls live and play in harmony with a shared goal of inspiring future generations of girls to dream big and be anything! When the very first and most iconic Barbie fashion doll is missing, Barbie & Barbie set out on an exciting adventure to find the missing outfit!

programme.title: Barbie Dream Magic
programme.desc: Chelsea thinks the only way she can have fun is by spending her Saturday with her new camper & the cool guitar it came with. But when she hurts her wrist and is put on bedrest, she’ll learn that’s not true!

programme.title: Barbie Dreamtopia
programme.desc: Join Barbie and Chelsea on magical adventures in Dreamtopia, as they transform into mermaids, fly over Sweetville with fairy bubble wings and take a ride on the back of the Elephant King of Sparkle Mountain.

Dive into a world of imagination and creativity with Barbie and her beloved doll companions. Don't miss out on the magic and fun!

programme.title: Enchantimals
programme.desc: The Enchantimals dolls are lovable characters who share a special bond with their animal friends -- they’re always together, and they look alike, too! Each doll shares a ritual with her animal friends that celebrates their unique traits and personalities. Together, they work to create balance, peace and harmony among all living things. Let these whimsical characters and their nature adventures enchant you!

programme.title: Pingu In The City
programme.desc: Join Pingu in his secret, whale-shaped funhouse in this engaging show, packed with sketches and facts about the amazing world of penguins.

programme.title: Barbie Dream Squad

programme.title: Wellie Wishers
programme.desc: The WellieWishers™ discover that a songbird is protecting a nest of eggs close to their playhouse.

programme.title: Wellie Wishers
programme.desc: Meet the WellieWishers™ - a sweet and lively group of friends who play in their whimsical garden. While the girls play, they learn about the natural world and experience the magic of their imaginations. Their sometimes silly, sometimes serious adventures allow them to explore the wonders of their garden - where all living things thrive and grow, along with creativity, friendship, and kindness.
